titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter describing the wonderful woorke of God in deliuering a mayden within the city of Chester, from an horrible kinde of torment and sicknes 16. of february 1564
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, of Chester.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dewyllyng [sic] in litle Britayne streete, beyonde Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I. F. Signed at end: The names of the wytnesses hereof, which also dyd set to their handes. Sir William Caluerley knight, Richard Hurlestone Esquier. Iohn Fisher Gentleman.
Publication year is according to Lady Day dating.
Concerning the exorcism of Anne Milner by John Lane, a minister in the county of Chester.
Imperfect; title page torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
